Item.name: Rapidly Mutating Egg
Item.description: This strange egg seems to be composed entirely of human flesh.

Item.name: Mimicry's Blade
Item.description: The yearning to imitate the human form is sloppily reflected on the E.G.O, as if it were a reminder that it should remain a mere desire. When the unfamiliar and otherworldly eyes stare at you, you will feel a chill up your spine. If pushed to the limit, one can wield it. It can deliver a powerful downswing that should be impossible for a human.

Item.name: Prototype Mimicry
Item.description: Although it has less raw power than a typical copy of Mimicry, a sufficiently skilled wielder can still become legendary with this blade in hand.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O: Cavernous Wailing Hammer
Item.description: Croohoo, croohoo.

Item.name: Cavernous Wailing Hammer (Locked)
Item.description: Croohoo, croohoo.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O: Cavernous Wailing
Item.description: An E.G.O. suit created from the Blubbering Toad's essence, worn in place of a gene splicer. This one provides a fair bit of general protection and slowly heals insanity. Disappears if the wearer dies. Avoid losing your mind while wearing this.

Item.name: Cavernous Wailing (Corroded)
Item.description: A corroded variant of Cavernous Wailing.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Penitence Crown
Item.description: A crown of thorns that may hurt to wear, but it anchors the user to reality and keeps them sane.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Penitence Hammer
Item.description: A hammer which can slightly recover the wielder's sanity when they hit an enemy.

Item.name: Corroded Kleinhammer
Item.description: I LOVE YOU

Item.name: Blood Cannon (AI)
Item.description: The Headless Ichthys's pressurized blood cannon.

Item.name: Blood Cannon
Item.description: The Headless Ichthys's pressurized blood cannon.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O: Fluid Sac
Item.description: This battle will conclude in victory.

Item.name: KQE Radio
Item.description: Some kind of built-in communications system.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Regret Straightjacket
Item.description: This straight-jacket is not nearly enough to hold my violence back.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Regret
Item.description: Enemies crushed by this regret can never return to their normal life.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Magic Bullet Uniform
Item.description: Though the original's power couldn't be fully extracted, the magic this holds is still potent.

Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Lower Arm

Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Upper Arm

Item.description: Though the original's power couldn't be fully extracted, the magic this holds is still potent.

sprite.name: Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Upper Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Upper Arm

Item.name: LCE E.G.O: Fell Bullet Uniform
Item.description: I shall feel the ponderous mass of the gun barrel rest upon my viscera.

sprite.name: Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Upper Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Upper Arm

Item.name: LCE E.G.O: Fell Bullet Coat
Item.description: Let this accursed bullet pierce through them...!

Item.name: (LOCKED) Der Fluchschütze's Coat
Item.description: Though the original's power couldn't be fully extracted, the magic this holds is still potent. Seven damages reduced to 70%.

sprite.name: Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Upper Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Upper Arm

damagemodifier.afflictionidentifiers: lacerations, bitewounds, blunttrauma, burn, bleeding, gunshotwound, pale

Item.name: (LOCKED) Der Fluchschütze's Overcoat
Item.description: Though the original's power couldn't be fully extracted, the magic this holds is still potent. Seven damages reduced to 70%.

damagemodifier.afflictionidentifiers: lacerations, bitewounds, blunttrauma, burn, bleeding, gunshotwound, pale

Item.name: (LOCKED) Der Freischütz's Coat
Item.description: Though the original's power couldn't be fully extracted, the magic this holds is still potent. Seven damages reduced to 70%.

sprite.name: Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Lower Arm

Item.name: (LOCKED) Der Freischütz's Overcoat
Item.description: Though the original's power couldn't be fully extracted, the magic this holds is still potent. Seven damages reduced to 70%.

damagemodifier.afflictionidentifiers: lacerations, bitewounds, blunttrauma, burn, bleeding, gunshotwound, pale

Item.name: LCE E.G.O: Fell Bullet
Item.description: A powerful shotgun that derives its appearance from an Old Earth weapon. There is some confusion about its classification; in reality, it is a rifle, but its bullets scatter due to the Abnormality's power.

Item.name: Fell Bullet (AI)
Item.description: A powerful shotgun that derives its appearance from an Old Earth weapon. There is some confusion about its classification; in reality, it is a rifle, but its bullets scatter due to the Abnormality's power.

Item.name: Fell Bullet (Abnormality)
Item.description: A powerful shotgun that derives its appearance from an Old Earth weapon. There is some confusion about its classification; in reality, it is a rifle, but its bullets scatter due to the Abnormality's power.

Item.name: Der Freischütz's Magic Bullet
Item.description: The weapon's bullets travel across the corridor, along the horizon. Each bullet has a 1 in 7 chance of being enhanced.

Item.name: Der Freischutz's Magic Bullet (AI Mode)
Item.description: The weapon's bullets travel across the corridor, along the horizon. Striking enemies with the weapon's melee mode will enhance the next shot.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Magic Bullet (Ranged Mode)
Item.description: The weapon's bullets travel across the corridor, along the horizon. Striking enemies with the weapon's melee mode will enhance the next shot.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Magic Bullet (Melee Mode)
Item.description: Each melee hit with this weapon adds one Magic Bullet to the user, up to 7. Each Magic Bullet increases the power of the rifle, but also increases the user's sanity drain on fire.

Item.name: Naked Nest Seed
Item.description: A seed that allows the cultivation of a Naked Nest plant.. not sure why you'd want to do this.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Exuviae
Item.description: The slick sensation when holding this E.G.O may disturb some employees. When 'fed' with Enkephalin Modules, it can emit powerful energy blasts which can make targets more vulnerable.

Item.name: [ZAYIN] Don't Touch Me
Item.description: Seriously, DO NOT TOUCH THIS.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O: Talisman
Item.description: These talismans... can impede movement. The more of them are attached... the more the curse piles up.

Item.name: [ZAYIN] We Can Change Anything
Item.description: A cute-looking pastel white automated iron maiden that inflicts severe pain and damage on the occupant in exchange for Enkephalin modules.

Item.name: Apocalypse Beam
Item.description: After charging, unleashes a powerful beam.

Item.name: Apocalypse Beam (AI)
Item.description: After charging, unleashes a powerful beam.

Item.name: Wound of Sorrow
Item.description: After charging, unleashes a powerful beam.

Item.name: Inconsolable Grief
Item.description: After charging, unleashes a powerful beam.

Item.name: Judged Unworthy
Item.description: You were judged unworthy.

Item.name: Judged Worthy
Item.description: You were judged worthy.

Item.name: Abnormality Crate
Item.description: A special crate designed to hold Abnormality-related items.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Heaven's Staff
Item.description: A sharp staff that seems to be made from the same strange living material as the Burrowing Heaven. Killing enemies with this weapon converts them into special Heaven's Thorns upon their death. Beware, these Thorns will attack anyone not wearing a Heaven Crown.

Item.name: Heaven's Crown
Item.description: As it spreads its wings for an old god, a heaven just for you burrows its way. Wearing this crown marks you as an ally of the Heaven's Thorns that are created by the Heaven Staff.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Solemn Lament for the Living
Item.description: A somewhat bulky handgun that appears to fire high-velocity butterflies instead of bullets. The weapon reloads with the user's sanity instead of physical ammunition. Inflicts Butterfly (Living), dealing sanity damage.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Congratulations for the Departed
Item.description: A somewhat bulky handgun that appears to fire high-velocity butterflies instead of bullets. The weapon reloads with the user's sanity instead of physical ammunition. Inflicts Butterfly (Departed), dealing physical damage based on the target's sanity.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Solemn Lament Coat
Item.description: The undertaker's outfit belongs to those who pay tribute to the dead. Only a solemn mind is required to express condolences; there is no need for showy accessories. If you see a mound standing out in the middle of the desert, please do not desecrate it. It is the grave of the countless butterflies that have died in this place.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Solemn Lament Suit
Item.description: The somber design is a reminder that not a sliver of frivolity is allowed for the minds of those who mourn.

Item.name: [ZAYIN] Chairway to Hell
Item.description: A bizarre chair which, if not properly placed, can and will cause the user to phase unpredictably through floors and walls.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Contempt, Awe
Item.description: 'Scatter. Every gaze shall be drawn to this squalidity.' Attire created from the Spiral of Contempt's E.G.O.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Blade of Awe
Item.description: A blade made of shimmering liquid gold, this EGO was extracted from the Spiral of Contempt.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Blade of Contempt
Item.description: A blade made of rippling blood, this EGO was extracted from the Spiral of Contempt.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Binds Uniform
Item.description: 'I am bound to reign alone atop this solitary throne...' Reduces movement speed, but improves melee attack potency when worn.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Binds Blade
Item.description: 'How insipid… Must I deal with it myself?' Swinging the blade applies a special buff to the user, reducing movement speed and increasing melee attack potency.

Item.name: Binds
Item.description: How insipid… Must I deal with it myself?

Item.name: Binds
Item.description: How insipid… Must I deal with it myself?

Item.name: Summoned Blade of the King in Binds
Lobotomy E.G.O.: CENSORED
Item.description: (CENSORED) has the ability to (CENSORED), but this is a horrendous sight for those watching. Looking at the E.G.O for more than 3 seconds will make you sick.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Twilight's Robes
Item.description: The three birds united their efforts to defeat the beast. This could stop countless incidents, but you’ll have to be prepared to step into the Black Forest…

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Twilight's Wings
Item.description: The twilight was endured, and we now face towards dawn. Has the birds' twittering in the forest finally stopped?

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Twilight's Sword
Item.description: Just like how the ever-watching eyes, the scale that could measure any and all sin, and the beak that could swallow everything protected the peace of the Black Forest... The wielder of this armament may also bring peace as they did.

Item.name: Lobotomy E.G.O.: Mimicry's Shell
Item.description: It takes human hide to protect human flesh. To protect humans, you need something made out of humans. Even though this is not the skin of a human, it is still akin to that barrier which protects us. Employees using this equipment may lose the last bits of love for humanity that they may have left.

Item.name: Water Cannon (AI)
Item.description: The Siltcurrent's pressurized blood cannon.

Item.name: Blind Obsession's Anchor
Item.description: 'The waves... will lay waste to everything in our way.' Apply Charge and Poise to nearby allies, including yourself, when you strike an enemy.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Blind Obsession's Sword
Item.description: 'Shatter.' Gain Charge and Poise when you attack an enemy.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Blind Obsession's Uniform
Item.description: 'I am the only one who moves in these waves.' Increases movement speed while you have Psychosis.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Blind Obsession's Coat
Item.description: 'All hands, full speed towards where the lights flicker.' Grants 15% additional defense to the torso.

Item.name: LCE E.G.O.: Blind Obsession's Hat
Item.description: A symbol of authority. Protects the wearer from oxygen deprivation.

Item.name: N Corp E.G.O: Fell Bullet Uniform
Item.description: They would point and jeer at the rags splattered with the blood of fellowship. The fools; only I can grasp the highest degree of tragedy upon this earth.

sprite.name: Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Lower Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Left Upper Arm
Der Freischutz's Clothes 1 Right Upper Arm

Item.name: N Corp E.G.O: Fell Bullet Coat
Item.description: A fellow of mine has once spoken thusly to me—too late, too late...

Item.name: N Corp E.G.O: Fell Bullet
Item.description: Obsidian shards of blood shatter with echoes of glass; the perforating bullet scatters to a thousand pellets to bore into them all.

Item.name: N Corp E.G.O.: Contempt, Awe Suit
Item.description: Eyes. On. Me.

Item.name: N Corp E.G.O: Contempt, Awe Coat
Item.description: Don't go blind on me now.

Item.name: N Corp E.G.O: Contempt, Awe's Lance
Item.description: You squalid thing. Without my touch, that abominable form is unable to change, unable to be hidden. So... scatter.

Item.name: N Corp E.G.O: Contempt, Awe's Sword
Item.description: Blood will scatter.
